website_summaries.verdict: This hypoallergenic milk cleanser is the ultimate option for anyone dealing with sensitive skin.
pros: Features cucumber, aloe, and oatmeal for soothing sensitive skin
Its probiotic formula reduces skin irritation while moisturizing
Made without common irritants, like mineral oil and alcohol
cons: Tula’s clean and nourishing ingredients seem to have driven up the price

customer_reviews.title: It helped with my rosacea
customer_reviews.text: When I got the email about this new product I decided to give it a try and I ordered the first bottle and I loved it! It’s super gentle on my skin and it helped a lot with my rosacea! It doesn’t dry the skin that other cleansers do. This is my second bottle. The only reason that I give 4 starts it’s because the first bottle didn’t last 1 month! I’m trying to use the second one “better” to make it last longer. But it’s priceless to me that my face isn’t that red anymore :)
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best face wash I’ve ever used.. I have sensitive skin and acne prone skin, this doesn’t cause any flare ups or irritation! I will definitely be repurchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Cenee Ken Vitela

customer_reviews.title: Great for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this when I purchased another Tula product, so glad I did. I have a hard time finding anything for my skin that doesn't annoy it. This is mild and leaves my skin soft, not dry. I bought the full size and am loving it. There isn't a smell to it but it feels soothing and it doesn't bother my rosacea either.
customer_reviews.author: mbsm

customer_reviews.title: Light but Effective
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin which is easily irritated. With this said, I am glad I purchased this face cleanser. It works well to cleanse while calming simultaneously. After a few weeks of use, my face no longer has dry skin or red blotches. It is a bit watery but certainly does what it is intended to do.
customer_reviews.author: FL

customer_reviews.title: clogged pores
customer_reviews.text: i was super excited about this product, loved the tingly feeling and adding it before my under-eye concealer, but it clogged my pores and i started to break out.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed this wash. will need to buy another one soon. i use this one in the morning and my acne one at night since I have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Love this Cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using TULA Probiotic Skin Care Super Calm Gentle Milk Cleanser for a couple of weeks. I have extremely sensitive skin and often times using new products will cause my skin to become red, inflamed, and break out. Not with TULA. I love how my skin looks healthier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shine!
customer_reviews.text: I love putting this on in the morning before I get my makeup on or during the day when I need a pick-me-up! It’s soft and leaves a pretty shine on my cheekbones. It feels like it wakes me up a little bit more!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Stretz

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have dry and sensitive skin. This is the first cleanser that did not make my skin feel tight or make it red or sting after washing! It’s very gentle and my skin feels soft after using it too .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It’s gentle yet totally cleanses! Smells great and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Cadwallader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dry/sensitive skin types!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those with sensitive skin. Does not strip the skin of natural oils and is good for daily use. After finishing my first bottle, I will definitely be repurchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Chanel

customer_reviews.title: Tula
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It has really helped clear up my skin! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Arrant

customer_reviews.title: Milk cleanser does skin good
customer_reviews.text: I love the milk cleanser. Aw rice enough for my skin yet strong enough to cut through the dirt on my face. And fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Erica Mack

customer_reviews.title: Very watery
customer_reviews.text: It’s really watery so it takes a lot to wash with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was using this so I decided to try it and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this cleanser. It helps reduce redness in my face and is moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S

customer_reviews.title: A product I can trust that works
customer_reviews.text: This product is very light no greasy residue. You have a clean fresh feeling. Noticed a difference in my skin especially after giving birth to my daughter. This product is also safe for breast feeding which I liked
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser seems to work very well so far! I like how smooth it is. It’s seeming to really clean out my pores as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle and calming cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Very gentle very calming and moisturizing. The best facial cleanser I have found
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TULA Probiotic Skin Care Super Calm Gentle Milk Cleanser | Nourishing and Calming for Sensitive Skin with Colloidal Oatmeal, Cucumber & Ginger | 5 fl. oz.
feature_bullets: DESIGNED FOR SENSITIVE SKIN - Sensitive skin calls for the most gentle skincare, and that starts at the foundation: cleanser. This lightweight, milky cleanser is specially formulated to leave skin feeling more nourished and calm, not at all parched.

INSTANTLY SOOTHE STRESSED, IRRITATED SKIN - Full of good-for-you ingredients like probiotics, colloidal oatmeal, cucumber & ginger, and 100% free of fragrance, alcohol, phthalates, sulfates & other irritants.
GOOD FOR ALL - Suitable for all skin types and all ages – perfect for those with dry, dehydratyed, sensitive or problematic skin.

TULA & PROBIOTICS - TULA is the leader in probiotic skincare. We combine powerful probiotics and skin superfoods for healthy, balanced and glowing skin. All our products are clean, clinically proven, and effective.
WORRY-FREE RETURN POLICY - Try TULA worry-free with our 30-day return policy. We stand behind our products and want you to love them as much as we do.
